title: Was almost a great product
body: I bought this in the prime day sale on 15th July,  only by the brand value, as inalsa products are great value for money as we also have other products of them. On my first try for this product i tried using mccain potato cubes in this. I started the fryer, and wall was going great for 4-5 mins until suddenly the heating light went off, i thought it was a cycle thing, but 10-15 sec later , the power light went off while the timer was still running as it is spring based. I tried to take the container out and re-insert it. the power and heating lights went online, and that is when i realised as i left the handle that these were pressure based and as soon as i left the pressure on the handle , there might have been a connection problem due to loose grip, the lights went off again. I gave it 2-3 more tries , normally holding it thinking it was a one off thing. But the same happened over and over again. Then i immediately ordered a return which was quick.Although there was a problem in the piece, i lost the interest in the product itself, the potato bites did actually get cooked properly, but i lost the trust in the mechanism. I ll try some other brand some other time now.

I ordered replacement and the replacement air fryer came in another 24 hours. I was kinda sceptical at this point and tried the air fryer, immediately after it arrived. To my surprise, it had few minor scratches here and there but I paid least attention towards them and tried using the air fryer. It worked! I am writing this review after around 2-3 months of usage and can say that it is working quite nicely. Have made many dishes and the experience has been good. It's not very good when it comes to deep fried items like Pakora or Samosas but it definitely is a good replacement for normal shallow frying and grilling. Overall, I am quite satisfied with the purchase.
